full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DZAMBHA LA'I DKYIL 'KHOR SGRUB MCHOD KYI MJUG TU TSOGS KYI DKAR STON BYA TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (ZHES PA 'DI YANG DKYIL 'KHOR SGRUB MCHOD KYI YAN LAG TU DKYIL 'KHOR MCHOD CING DKAR STON BYA BA'I PHYAG SROL 'DUG PAS, 'DI LTAR @003A *, ,BYAS NA 'JUG PA DGE 'AM SNYAM PA'I BSAM PAS, ^BKA' 'GYUR PA NO MON HAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I MA nI'I RIL SGRUB KYI MJUG TU TSOGS KYI DKAR STON BYA TSUL LA GZHI BYAS TE DPAL BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG GIS BGYIS PA'O,, ,,BKRA SHIS KHYAD PAR GYUR CIG ,)
